Package org.cloudbus.cloudsim.container.containerProvisioners

Class ContainerBwProvisionerSimple

java.lang.Object
org.cloudbus.cloudsim.container.containerProvisioners.ContainerBwProvisioner
org.cloudbus.cloudsim.container.containerProvisioners.ContainerBwProvisionerSimple
public class ContainerBwProvisionerSimple extends ContainerBwProvisioner
ContainerBwProvisionerSimple is a class that implements a simple best effort allocation policy: if there is bw available to request, it allocates; otherwise, it fails.
Author:
Sareh Fotuhi Piraghaj, Rodrigo N. Calheiros, Anton Beloglazov
